com.hemebiotech.analytics

Class AnalyticsCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hemebiotech.analytics.AnalyticsCounter

  • public class AnalyticsCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses both interfaces ISymptomReader, ISymptomWriter in attempt to count and sort symptoms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnalyticsCounter(ISymptomReader reader, ISymptomWriter writer)
      This constructor specifies two objects that implement two differents interfaces.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnalyticsCounter

        public AnalyticsCounter(ISymptomReader reader,
                        ISymptomWriter writer)
        This constructor specifies two objects that implement two differents interfaces.
        Parameters:
        reader - an object that implements ISymptomReader to read symptoms from a file
        writer - an object that implements ISymptomWriter to write symptoms/quantities in a file

    • Method Detail

      • getSymptoms

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSymptoms()
        Get all the symptoms from the ISymptomReader.
        Returns:
        a list of all Symptoms obtained from a data source, duplicates are probable

      • countSymptoms

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> countSymptoms(java.util.List<java.lang.String> symptoms)
        Count the quantity of each symptoms.
        Parameters:
        symptoms - a List with elements of type String represents all the symptoms
        Returns:
        a Map with the symptom as key (String) and its quantity as value (Integer)

      • sortSymptoms

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> sortSymptoms(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> symptomsCounter)
        Sort the symptoms alphabetically.
        Parameters:
        symptomsCounter - a Map with the symptom as key(String) and its quantity as value(Integer)
        Returns:
        a Map with the same content but with sorted symptoms as key

      • writeSymptoms

        public void writeSymptoms(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> sortedSymptoms)
        Write all symptoms and each quantity using ISymptomWriter.
        Parameters:
        sortedSymptoms - a Map with the symptom as key (String) and its quantity as value (Integer)
